title: Portrait of a people: impressions of Britain
subject_group: Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/Great Britain - Social life and customs
Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/Great Britain - Description and travel
description: This film is a poetic evocation of the history and character of a nation, and the quality of its life today. The visual panorama of British landscape, industrial strength, and social achievement is accompanied by spoken words, based on the thoughts of Britons. It takes the form of a film journey which seeks to convey an understanding of the ways in which people have adapted to the changed imposed by recent development.
